DataElement.preferredName: CRQ-SAS 10 Last 2 Weeks How Much of the Time Feel Very Confident Can Deal with Illness Score 7 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Persons' stated observation in the last 2 weeks of how much of the time they felt very confident and sure that they could deal with their illness, using an 7 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format Past 2 Weeks How Much of the Time Feel Very Confident Can Deal with Illness Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A standardized rating scale developed by Schunemann et al in 2003, which is a self-administered instrument used to measure the health-related quality of life (HRQL) in patients with chronic airflow limitation._A period of time consisting of the 14 days before the present._A question about how much of the time something is occurring or has occurred._A question about an individual feeling very confident and sure that you could deal with your illness._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A standardized rating scale developed by Schunemann et al in 2003, which is a self-administered instrument used to measure the health-related quality of life (HRQL) in patients with chronic airflow limitation.

Concepts.longName: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format
Concepts.definition: A standardized rating scale developed by Schunemann et al in 2003, which is a self-administered instrument used to measure the health-related quality of life (HRQL) in patients with chronic airflow limitation.

Property.preferredName: Past 2 Weeks How Much of the Time Feel Very Confident Can Deal with Illness Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 14 days before the present.:A question about how much of the time something is occurring or has occurred.:A question about an individual feeling very confident and sure that you could deal with your illness.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 14 days before the present.
A question about how much of the time something is occurring or has occurred.

Concepts.longName: Feel Very Confident Can Deal with Illness
Concepts.definition: A question about an individual feeling very confident and sure that you could deal with your illness.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ReferenceDocuments.name: In the LAST 2 WEEKS, how much
ReferenceDocuments.description: In the LAST 2 WEEKS, how much of the time did you feel very confident and sure that you could deal with your illness?
